channel.title: problem with the shadows in game
channel.description:
I have problem with the shadows in game all charakters have a black square as you can se in the picture
here is my system config if it to any help ------------------ System Information ------------------ Time of this report: 9/18/2012, 22:53:37 Machine name: ROBERT-STATIONÄ Operating System: Windows XP Professional (5.1, Build 2600) Service Pack 3 (2600.xpsp_sp3_gdr.120504-1619) Language: Swedish (Regional Setting: Swedish) System Manufacturer: ASUSTek Computer Inc. System Model: K8N BIOS: BIOS Date: 02/16/06 15:44:49 Ver: 08.00.09 Processor: AMD Athlon(tm) 64 Processor 3400+, MMX, 3DNow, ~2.4GHz Memory: 3072MB RAM Page File: 768MB used, 5213MB available Windows Dir: C:\WINDOWS DirectX Version: DirectX 10.0 (4.10.0000.5512) DX Setup Parameters: Not found DxDiag Version: 5.03.2600.5512 32bit Unicode
------------ DxDiag Notes ------------ DirectX Files Tab: No problems found. Display Tab 1: The file nv4_disp.dll is not digitally signed, which means that it has not been tested by Microsoft's Windows Hardware Quality Labs (WHQL). You may be able to get a WHQL logo'd driver from the hardware manufacturer. Sound Tab 1: No problems found. Music Tab: No problems found. Input Tab: No problems found. Network Tab: No problems found.
-------------------- DirectX Debug Levels -------------------- Direct3D: 0/4 (n/a) DirectDraw: 0/4 (retail) DirectInput: 0/5 (n/a) DirectMusic: 0/5 (n/a) DirectPlay: 0/9 (retail) DirectSound: 0/5 (retail) DirectShow: 0/6 (retail)

Caps=VideoProcess_YUV2RGB VideoProcess_StretchX VideoProcess_StretchY DeinterlaceTech_BOBVerticalStretch {6CB69578-7617-4637-91E5-1C02DB810285}: Format(In/Out)=(UYVY,YUY2) Frames(Prev/Fwd/Back)=(0,0,0) Caps=VideoProcess_YUV2RGB VideoProcess_StretchX VideoProcess_StretchY DeinterlaceTech_BOBVerticalStretch {6CB69578-7617-4637-91E5-1C02DB810285}: Format(In/Out)=(YV12,0x3231564e) Frames(Prev/Fwd/Back)=(0,0,0) Caps=VideoProcess_YUV2RGB VideoProcess_StretchX VideoProcess_StretchY DeinterlaceTech_PixelAdaptive item.title: problem with the shadows in game
item.dc:creator: bondmaster
item.source: problem with the shadows in game

item.title: problem with the shadows in game
item.dc:creator: kaczorws
item.description:
Problem with square black shadows and non-working flashlight already reported here:
https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?p=498033

It affects all 7xxx GF cards. There is already a fix for this problem, you need to downgrade your GPU drivers, 168.16 is confirmed to work good, but probably some newer drivers will work as well. Just stay out of latest 3xx.xx drivers and you’ll be fine

Read full topic
